turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks? Do you mean the Starbucks on Riverside Drive in Toluca Lake?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the Starbucks on Riverside Drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Calling Starbucks on Riverside Drive in Toluca Lake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Nonfat Vanilla Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirming Grande Nonfat Vanilla Latte for Angela.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, could I also have chocolate sprinkled on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirming Grande Nonfat Vanilla Latte with chocolate sprinkled on top for Angela.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. How much will it be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your account will be charged $4.95. Do you want to leave a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please. Add $1.00 for the tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Adding $1.00 for the tip. $5.95 will be charged to your account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Grande Nonfat Vanilla Latte with chocolate sprinkled has been ordered, and will be ready for pick up soon at Starbucks on Riverside Drive in Toluca Lake.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt has been sent to your phone via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I see it now - thank you!
